question: Agharkar Research Institute, that has developed new high-yield wheat, is based at which location?
explanation:
The Pune based Agharkar Research Institute (ARI) has recently developed a new high yield wheat variety named MACS 6478.
Agharkar Research Institute is an autonomous institute of the Department of Science and Technology (DST). The MACS 6478 variety grows fast and scores high on quality compared to conventional varieties.
